concept.title: Adding a Sametime administrator in the Domino LDAP
concept.shortdesc: Use the Domino Directory to give a group of administrators access to the Sametime Administration Tool.

conbody.p: The administrator account that is created during the Sametime deployment can access all features of the Sametime Administration Tool ,and can provide other administrators with access to the Administration Tool.

This procedure applies only to the LDAP-formatted Domino Directory that functions as the user repository for a Sametime deployment. If you use a different LDAP directory, create the new administrator using your LDAP directory tools.
